#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;


int main()
{
    long long t,n,m,fibo1,fibo2;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;
        fibo1=1;
        fibo2=1;
        while(--n)
        {
            fibo1=(fibo1+fibo2)%m;
            fibo2=(fibo1+fibo2)%m;
        }
        cout<<fibo1%m<<"/"<<fibo2%m<<endl;

    }
}
